Try.description: Press <action="GotoNextError"> to go to the next highlighted error in the file.
Press <action="ShowErrorDescription"> to see the error description.
Press <action="ShowIntentionActions"> and select <bold>Add exception to method signature</bold>.
Press and select try/finally to surround it with selection.
Close the reader in the finally block by writing fileReader.close()
Press <action="HighlightUsagesInFile"> to highlight all usages of the symbol at the caret within the file.
